name: EVEOnline
0:
”Alexa, ask eve online where is thera”
”Alexa, ask eve online when is the next fleet”
”Alexa, ask eve online where is the nearest trade hub”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: eve online
des:
This skill supports you while playing EVE Online®.

The following options are currently available:

- Thera wormhole - search for the nearest connection from Jita to Thera, including mass and EOL status. Example: "Alexa, ask eve online where is Thera"

- NPSI fleets - tells you the details of the next NPSI fleet (Fun Inc., Friday Yarrrr, Redemption Road, CAS, Spectre): Example: "Alexa, ask eve online when is the next fleet"

- Tradehub - provides the route to the nearest trade hub (Jita, Amarr, Dodixie, Rens). Example: "Alexa, ask eve online where is the nearest trade hub"

- Jump Fatigue - returns the time until the blue timer runs out. Beispiel: "Alexa, ask eve online how much blue timer I have left"

- Wallet - provides the amount of ISK you have in your wallet. Beispiel: "Alexa, ask eve online how much money I have in the account"

- Charakterwechsel - links a different EVE account. Beispiel: "Alexa, start eve online and select a different character"


EVE Online® is a Trademark of CCP hf. All EVE related materials are property of CCP Games
This skill is not affiliated with EVE Online® ("EVE") or CCP hf. and is just a fan project.
